data.question: What is the chemical formula of the compound obtained hydrothermally using iodine molecules as a precursor template?
What structural feature is unique to the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7–?
data.answer: It exhibits the first observed bipillared-bilayer structure featuring both interdigitation and interpenetration.

data.question: True or False: The compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– displays high framework stability in both acidic and alkaline solutions.
What happens to the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– when it is slowly released in dry methanol?
True or False: The electrical conductivity and nonlinear optical activity (NLO) are the same between [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– and its methanol released form.
What is the space group of the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7–?
True or False: The compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– can partially recover iodine from cyclohexane.
What is the effect of polyiodide anions on the electrical conductivity of [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7–?
data.answer: Differences of up to 100 times in electrical conductivity have been measured between the compound and its methanol released form.

data.question: True or False: The compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– is the first 3D-metal based MOF crystallizing in the Pcc2 space group.
What is the iodine content percentage in the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7–?
How does the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– release iodine in dry methanol?
data.answer: It slowly releases iodine to form [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2](I–)2·3.5CH3OH.

data.question: True or False: The compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– can be used for the storage/sorption of iodine.
What is the yield percentage of the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– when synthesized?
True or False: The compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– undergoes a structural change when immersed in dry methanol for 30 days.
What is the effect of polyiodide anions on the nonlinear optical activity of [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7–?
data.answer: Differences of up to 4 times in nonlinear optical activity (NLO) have been measured between the compound and its methanol released form.

data.question: True or False: The compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– maintains its crystalline structure after releasing iodine in dry methanol.
What is the role of iodine in the synthesis of [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7–?
data.answer: Iodine acts as a versatile precursor template.

data.question: True or False: The compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– is multifunctional, displaying electrical conductivity, NLO, and crystal–crystal stability.
How does the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7– react to acidic and alkaline solutions?
data.answer: It shows high framework stability in both acidic (HCl) and alkaline (NaOH) solutions.

data.question: What is the significance of the Pcc2 space group for the compound [Cu6(pybz)8(OH)2]·I5–·I7–?
data.answer: It is noncentrosymmetric, contributing to the compound's second-order nonlinear optical activity.
